name: @compliance-theater/send-api-request
description: API request utilities for the Title IX Victim Advocacy Platform

scripts.build:publish: yarn workspace @compliance-theater/send-api-request run build:clean && yarn workspace @compliance-theater/send-api-request run build && yarn workspace @compliance-theater/send-api-request pack --out ./dist/@compliance-theater-send-api-request.tgz
scripts.build:typescript:
echo 'Building lib/send-api-request...' && tsc -b tsconfig.json && printf '[1;32mBuild complete: @compliance-theater/send-api-request.[0m
' || (printf '[31mBuild failed: @compliance-theater/send-api-request.[0m
' >&2; exit 1)
